questions.question: Do you have any new trouble breathing?
questions.help: For example, you're gasping or panting for breath, and can't get your words out.
answers: Yes - you can't get your words out

questions.question: Have you got intense pain in your chest or back?
questions.help: For example, the pain is stopping you from doing or thinking about anything else.

questions.question: Have you had any of these things since your injury?
answers: You can't control when you wee or poo
You can't move one or both legs
Both legs or around your back passage are numb or have pins and needles
The bones in your back or neck are painful

questions.question: Have you got either of these types of pain?
answers: It's intense and constant and doesn't stop for a moment
It's intense and I have to stay completely still as it's so bad
